strings.Value: "Have we met?"
"What are you doing here?"
"So, have you found anything?"
"I have to go."
"You keep the treasure."
[Take the coins] "Congratulations on the lucky find!"
"What do you mean, 'share'? You'll give me all you've found immediately."
"Lucky you! You must have been kissed by Desna herself!"
"Look! It's the {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}! You've got yourself pretty far from the capital, haven't you?"
"It's all thanks to you! Farewell, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness} — here's hoping we see you again sometime!" {n}Having handed you the coins, the treasure hunters leave.{/n}

"You don't remember us? Well, I guess you probably got too much on your plate to remember everyone you happen across... We're the folk you met in the {g|Narlmarches}Narlmarches{/g}! We were digging for treasure under a tree, but there wasn't anything there. Then you gave us a hint on where to go — without you, we'd still be stumping around that swamp, all for nothing!"

"What do you mean, what are we doing here? You were the one who {d|c21 Golddiggers Random}pointed{/d} us out here toward the treasure, after all. It was a long walk, but we knew if the {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen} {mf|him|her}self told us to come here, it just had to be true!"

"What... but... But why? Shameful... That's just shameful! And to think, they call you 'Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}'!" {n}The peasants spit on the ground spitefully, but they hand over the treasure and leave hastily.{/n}
"You bet we did! We really found something good! Look at this!"

"Ah, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}, you're too kind! We'll pray for you every single day! Come along, fellows. Let's get out of here before we end up some monster's dinner!" {n}The treasure hunters bow and leave.{/n}
"Wait, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}, don't leave yet! I'm telling you, we found treasure! The treasure you told us about. Take a look!"
{n}The treasure hunter hands you a fistful of ancient coins, with a bit of soil mixed in.{/n} "We're fair, honest folk, you know! You pointed us to the treasure — this is your share!"
"Not as far as you! How did you even get here in such... uneaten shape?"
"Ha, who'd want us? Nothing really to take — even our meat is probably too dry!"
"I suppose the old saying is true: luck favors the fool and the drunkard..."
"Hey, we're not drunks! I haven't had a single sip in over a month!"
"No, no, never mind. Certainly not drunkards. Of course."
{n}Valerie shakes her head, smiling slightly.{/n} "They earned every coin of this treasure with the sweat of their brows. Leave these lucky ones to their reward."
"I hope you have wisdom enough to handle it properly." {n}Valerie looks at you with pride.{/n}
"How can you be such an unprincipled egoist?!"
{n}At the sight of gold, Nok-Nok's eyes gleam greedily. He begins scratching his hands as though trying to satisfy an itch.{/n} "More. All. Take all. You rule — it's your right to take all!"
"Oh, we're just normal folk — it's you who's been touched by her grace! I guess a bit of it just rubbed off on us!"
